SELECT
s.id as price_id product_id, price, quantity, begin_time, end_time FROM oomall_product p LEFT JOIN oomall_price_stock s ON p.id = s.product_id WHERE end_time >= now() AND begin_time <= now() AND id = #{id} AND product_sn = #{productSn} AND goods_id = #{goodsId}
